# to [[be]] [[sorry]]; to [[feel]] [[apologetic]]
#: {{zh-x|很 抱歉，您 要 辦 的 事 不 符合 規定，我們 不 能 辦理。|I'm sorry, we cannot process your request as it does not meet the requirements.}}

===Interjection===
{{zh-interj}}

# [[sorry]]

===Usage notes===
* This term is used for situations where one wants to express regret about something without necessarily casting blaming upon oneself or seeking forgiveness from the aggrieved party. Use {{m|zh|道歉}} for situations where the one would like to seek forgiveness.

* {{zh-l|對不起}}
